alert.note: Alert for Marion; Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 7:21PM EDT until August 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marion County in northern Florida... Putnam County in northeastern Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 720 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Satsuma, or near Pomona Park, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palatka, Pomona Park, East Palatka, Lake Delancy, George`s Lake, Florahome, Bostwick, Federal Point, Orange Mills, and Bardin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
